text: Leea tinctoria is a species of plant in the family Vitaceae. It is endemic to São Tomé Island.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Leea tinctoria. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. It is an important nectar source for the bird Nectarinia newtonii (Newton's yellow- breasted sunbird). It has orange flowers. ==References== Category:Flora of São Tomé Island tinctoria Category:Near threatened plants Category:Endemic flora of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Leea tinctoria
